name: Just another chance!
description:
In this game you have to prove your girlfriend that you're worth another chance by buying her flowers as fast as you can.  It was made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 95 with the theme of CHANCE

This game was made together with two of my friends, 

art and design by bimpero (https://bimpero.itch.io/,  http://youtube.com/channel/UCC_gPQCFIczNWiAuE4HjkEQ)

music by caioba

code and design by me (tinico)

We made this in a rush so it's not that polished lol but it's still fun, at least i think so

(by the way once you go to the flower shop and get the flower you have to go back to the house to give her the flower, it's not clear in the game sry)
